quest.name: All Fun and Games
journal:
 Quest Sync
The playful Loporrit has a new game to play.
objectives: Count the Loporrits at the designated location.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSA04245
dialogue.text: Greetings! I'm the Loporrit in charge of the children's romping grounds. I expect it will be quite the challenge keeping the children of Etheirys entertained with limited space and supplies...but I daresay I'm up to it!

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSA04245
dialogue.text: In fact, I but recently came up with a new game that requires no props nor preparation. I call it “The Loporrits Never Stoporrit (Name Pending Livingway's Approval).” Care to give it a go?

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSA04245
dialogue.text: I knew you would! Now, the game is very simple─you need only count the Loporrits hopping this way and that way...or possibly no way...before time is up.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSA04245
dialogue.text: I have the perfect place picked out to play─follow me to the Carrotorium!

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSA04245
dialogue.text: Do you see the carrot creation station there? When you're ready, see if you can count how many Loporrits are sneaking about it.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Inspect the designated location to begin counting Loporrits.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You will have thirty seconds to complete the task, after which you may give your answer to the playful Loporrit.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSA04245
dialogue.text: See if you can count the number of Loporrits there at the carrot creation station. It's not as easy as it looks! ...Assuming it looks easy. Does it?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Try counting the Loporrits again?

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSA04245
dialogue.text: So, do you think you counted them right? How many Loporrits did you see?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Three.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Four.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Five.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSA04245
dialogue.text: Oooh, so close! How about giving it one more try?

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSA04245
dialogue.text: We have a winner! Hm? Too easy, you say? Well, it's no fun if it's too hard!

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSA04245
dialogue.text: And you did have fun, didn't you!? Wait, hold that thought─our time here is nearly up, and structure is important for productive play. You can tell me all about the fun you had after we've returned to Bestways Burrow instead.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSA04245
dialogue.text: Now, tell me what you think. Was it a good game? Do you think the other children will like it, too?

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSA04245
dialogue.text: You're an adult? Goodness, I'm so sorry! It's just, I was told that the people of Etheirys are at least twice our height, and you're so... Ahem. Well, as for the matter at hand...

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSA04245
dialogue.text: Now, tell me what you think. I'm confident the children will like it, and it cuts back on equipment costs as well. I see no downsides! So...

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSA04245
dialogue.text: I want to hear your honest opinion. How was it?

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: I had a great time!

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Boooring.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: I've actually played this before.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSA04245
dialogue.text: Wonderful! I knew I came up with a terrific game, but hearing it from you is all the more reassuring!

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSA04245
dialogue.text: Oh, I see... Well, I appreciate your honesty. Looks like it's back to the drawing board with me.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSA04245
dialogue.text: What!? And here I thought I had come up with a new and exciting idea! I'll have to improve on it to make something truly unique...

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSA04245
dialogue.text: Thank you for taking the time to play with me. If I come up with a new game, I'll be sure to seek your expert opinion!
